metadata.Title: CVE-2017-1000024 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Shotwell version 0.24.4 or earlier and 0.25.3 or earlier is vulnerable to an information disclosure in the web publishing plugins resulting in potential password and oauth token plaintext transmission

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-1000024` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

shotwell - 0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5
shotwell-common - 0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: shotwell package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.0-0ubuntu4.5').
